function.name: coolingTemperature_increase
function.description: This function is used to increase the cooling temperature set on a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to increase the cooling temperature.

coolingTemperatureDelta.description: The amount by which to increase the cooling temperature.
